summary.span: 代表與 相關的參數集合，以及它們對 中資料行的個別對應。

span.span: Represents a collection of parameters relevant to an as well as their respective mappings to columns in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的參數數目必須等於命令文字內的參數預留位置的數目，否則為.NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB 可能會引發錯誤。The number of parameters in the collection must equal the number of parameter placeholders within the command text, otherwise the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB might raise an error. ## Examples 下列範例會建立多個執行個體經由內的集合。The following example creates multiple instances of through the collection within the . 這些參數用來選取資料來源中的資料，並將放在資料。These parameters are used to select data within the data source and place the data in the . 這個範例假設和已經建立具有適當的結構描述、 命令和連線。This example assumes that a and an have already been created with the appropriate schema, commands, and connection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbParameter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbParameter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbParameter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbParameter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請謹慎使用這個多載方法，以指定整數參數值。Use caution when using this overload of the method to specify integer parameter values. 因為此多載會採用`value`型別的，您必須將值轉換時輸入的值為零，如下列 C# 範例所示。Because this overload takes a `value` of type , you must convert the value to an type when the value is zero, as the following C# example demonstrates. ``` parameters.Add("@pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ``` 如果您不會執行這項轉換，編譯器會假設您嘗試呼叫多載。If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler will assume you are attempting to call the overload.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會搜尋與給定內。The following example searches for an with a given within an . 如果此參數存在，此範例會顯示的名稱和參數的索引。If the parameter exists, the example displays the name and index of the parameter. 如果參數不存在，則這個範例會顯示錯誤。If the parameter does not exist, the example displays an error. 這個範例假設已經存在。This example assumes that an has already been created. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OleDbParameterCollection.this1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbParameterCollection.this1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OleDbParameterCollection.this1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OleDbParameterCollection.this1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
